comment.author: 8735739@N08
comment._content: As I can observe, boat technology has advanced very much. But social classes remain through times.

comment.author: 73353386@N00
comment._content: I was there, you can see me...gal in the hat, third from the left. Them were good times.

comment.author: 16399037@N02
comment._content: Looking at the dress code for this boating outing, I would need say it is a far cry from the bikini (some times topless) and speedo  clad men that are observed at the modern day cove parties.

comment.author: 22349924@N08
comment._content: G@zu, in fact boat tech has remained largely similar too. . .

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
"Newport will see a lot of the New York Yacht Club on its annual cruise, which will sail into Newport Harbor Aug. 9, on Friday, and remain until the following Monday morning. This means a round of social activity ashore and afloat." 

-----From a New York Times story (June 30, 1912) on the upcoming summer social season at the resort town of Newport, R. I.

comment._content:
